metadata.description:
IF YOU MINT THIS, YOU AUTOMATICALLY GET A FREE MINT OF OUR NEXT RELEASE (FROM THE PM ALBUM) IN 2 WEEKS.

Who are Beachcrimes? We’re a duo from LA and we spent the last year making songs in hotel rooms around the world. Beachcrimes is the soundtrack to that adventure.

We made a lot of songs, and we’re excited to share them. All of them. This year we’re releasing 24 songs in 48 weeks. If we’re being real, it’s actually two albums – there’s AM and there’s PM. AM is the lite stuff, PM is the nite stuff. Think of it like the Summer Olympics and Winter Olympics, but for dance music.

“Drive (All Day All Night)” is the 8th of these 24 songs. We made this on a Tik Tok live stream 2 weeks ago and it hit our feels so hard that we decided it needed to be the next release. It’s about a long-distance relationship when you have a hard time connecting and staying in sync with each other. Would you drive all day and all night to see this person? You’re damn right you would!

lyrics.text:
Why I gotta miss you too much
Kissin through the phone ain’t enough
Baby all I need is your touch
Ooooh

Wanna be in your bed sleeping
More than every other weekend
Baby say the word I’m leaving
Ooooh

You say it’s been hard on us lately
I say that the distance ain’t on our side
Can’t sleep when I know that you’re waiting

Oh baby I would drive
All day, all night
To wake up by your side
All day, all night
I’m running through red lights
To make you mine
Baby I would drive
All day, all night

Oh baby I would drive
All day, all night

Miss the way it feels in your arms
Laying with you under the stars
Thousand miles don’t seem too far
Ooooh

When I could be in your bed sleeping
I don’t even need no reason
Baby say the word I’m leaving
Ooooh

You say it’s been hard on us lately
I say that the distance ain’t on our side
Can’t sleep when I know that you’re waiting

Oh baby I would drive
All day, all night
To wake up by your side
All day, all night
I’m running through red lights
To make you mine
Baby I would drive
All day, all night

Oh baby I would drive
All day, all night

Oh baby I would drive
All day, all night

metadata.name: Drive (All Day All Night) #1
metadata.title: Drive (All Day All Night)
